an5.146:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo.
an5.146:1.3: Kammantam kareti, adhikaranam adiyati, pamokkhesu bhikkhusu pativiruddho hoti, dighacarikam anavatthacarikam anuyutto viharati, nappatibalo hoti kalena kalam dhammiya kathaya sandassetum samadapetum samuttejetum sampahamsetum.
an5.146:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo.
an5.146:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo.
an5.146:2.3: Na kammantam kareti, na adhikaranam adiyati, na pamokkhesu bhikkhusu pativiruddho hoti, na dighacarikam anavatthacarikam anuyutto viharati, patibalo hoti kalena kalam dhammiya kathaya sandassetum samadapetum samuttejetum sampahamsetum.
an5.146:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo”ti.
